suncertify.server
Interface RemoteRoomReservations

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
URLyBirdReservations
public interface RemoteRoomReservations
extends Remote

Interface defining the business methods of the room reservation system. Extends Remote for connecting to the system remotely over RMI.

Author:
Oliver Hernandez

Method Summary
 boolean book(long roomId, String customerId)
          Book the specified hotel room.
 List<Room> search(String[] criteria)
          Search for hotel rooms matching the specified criteria.
 

Method Detail

search

List<Room> search(String[] criteria)
                  throws RemoteException
Search for hotel rooms matching the specified criteria.

Parameters:
criteria - a String array containing values that should be searched for.
Returns:
a collection of Room objects or null if none were found.
Throws:
RemoteException - when a network error occurs.
See Also:
DBAccess.findByCriteria(java.lang.String[])

book

boolean book(long roomId,
             String customerId)
             throws RemoteException,
                    RecordNotFoundException,
                    SecurityException
Book the specified hotel room.

Parameters:
roomId - the ID of the room to book.
customerId - the customer ID to book the room for.
Returns:
true if the room was booked successfully, false if the room is already booked.
Throws:
RemoteException - when a network error occurs.
RecordNotFoundException - when the specified room is not found.
SecurityException - when the room was attempted to be booked by another user, or the request to book the room timed-out.
